name: Everwitch
description:
The goal is to reach the end of the dungeon, try to explore every room.
Arrow Keys to move
C - Crystal ball
X - Use/Teleport(when wand obtained)

Missing sfx and music. The player cannot die because I couldn't get saving implemented in time.

16-10-2016 FINAL BUGFIXES
Uploaded the final version with all bugs fixed in the game.
